data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Yari Verschaeren (Anderlecht) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Michel Vlap.
The first half has been concluded at Lotto Park.
In the minute 45, The away team has substituted Carlos Cuesta with Dries Wouters. Domenico Olivieri is thus making his first change.
The second-half is underway at Lotto Park.
In the minute 57, Anderlecht have been awarded a penalty in Brussels...
Goal! Lukas Nmecha gives Anderlecht the lead from the penalty spot. The score is now 1-0.
At Lotto Park, Jhon Lucumi has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 68, The away team replace Patrik Hrosovsky with Cyriel Dessers.
Bogdan Mykhaylichenko is booked for the home team.
Michael Murillo for Anderlecht has been booked by Nathan Verboomen and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 79, Genk make their third substitution with Luca Oyen replacing Theo Bongonda.
Genk's Paul Onuachu has been booked in Brussels.
Cyriel Dessers (Genk) has received a yellow card from Nathan Verboomen.
In the minute 83, Anouar Ait El Hadj is replacing Paul Mukairu for the home team.
Vincent Kompany is making the team's third substitution at Lotto Park with Dauda Mohammed replacing Francis Amuzu.
It's 1-0 as the referee blows for full-time.
Michel Vlap (Anderlecht) has received a yellow card from Nathan Verboomen.
